name: Animal War (itch)
description: This game was made by the students of Akari's 3rd GAME ART WORKSHOP: Amarech is nearly 13 years old, and she's very tall for that age! She likes painting and watching series such as Descendants and Hunters. She often goes to the nearby city of Santander to play sports with her friends, too.  She loves pop music, specially Dua Lipa, and although she doesn't mind homework she doesn't like studying.Elena is 12 years old. She lives in Guarnizo, and she is a LEGO fan! She also loves games like Minecraft or Fortnite. Her favourite series are Stranger Things and Lock&Key. She even likes some vegetables, such as cauliflower. She's not very fond of social studies at school, tho.Mese is an 11 years old cat girl! Like her sister Ama, she's tall and smiling :) She like painting and being with her friends, but doesn't like horror movies or waking up too early! Her favourite film is Star Wars and she likes pop music -- not reggeton!
